scripts.build: rm -rf packages/example/base/public && mkdir packages/example/base/public && pnpm run --stream --parallel build
scripts.preview: pnpm run build && pnpm run --filter=base start
scripts.firebase: pnpm run build && rm -rf public && mkdir -p public && cp packages/example/base/index.html public/ && cp -r packages/example/base/public public/public/ && firebase deploy --only hosting && pnpm run clear
